Requests.GetAllSubcategory: select category_id, subcategory_id, subcategory_name from Subcategory
Requests.GetAllProducts: select product_id, product_name, product_description, product_img_url from Product
Requests.GetAllProductSubcategory: select subcategory_id, product_id, product_subcategory_id from ProductSubcategory
Requests.GetProductGallery: select product_id, img_id, img_url from ProductGallery
Requests.GetProductDrawings: select product_id, drawing_id, drawing_name, drawing_description, drawing_img_url from ProductDrawings
